Text.Text: This is a temporary node to save me renumbering 18 other nodes.
This is a temporary node to save me renumbering 18 other nodes.
Who is this filth that dares defile Sseth's sacred hallsss?!  We shall carve your heart from your chest and cast you into the pit!
Sss... you dare disturb my meditations? Your wordsss had best carry Sseth's weight, for I have no time to waste.  Ssspeak.
Ssss... I *felt* something amisss about you.  You shall find your answersss in Sseth'sss embrace, transgressor...  and I shall speed your journey.
*Questionssss?*  I have no *time* for such things!  Leave me to my thoughtssss.
Ah, Sssseth... Sseth isss the World Serpent... the Sibilant Death... it is Sseth who gives serpents home, and it is under Sseth's shadow that the world shall be given to ussss...

One such as you may only *hope* to glimpse Sseth's majesty... but you may ssstill serve Sseth.  Obey your mastersss in all thingsss, slay our enemiesss, ssspeak Sseth's words to others of your kind... and if you find the filthy Mezro warriors defiling our lands, place their heads upon pikes as warningsss...
Sssss... you must watch your tread here, many places forbidden to you, many doors closed to you, many traps, yesss.  Enter these placesss, and you shall join the heartless dead within the pit.

Keep your feet within the Temple area, and the feeding ground to the sssouth... all else is trapped with Sseth's blessings... and have ssslain many, yesss.  Stick to the pathsss permitted you, and do not stray.
Do not set foot within the Inner Coils of the temple... within, the Viper's Fangs and the Coiled Cabal perform their rituals, and they do not take kindly to interruptionssss.

The Viper's Fangs are the teeth of Sseth the World Serpent, unseen, deadly, poisonous.  Assassins, striking in secret, some humans, some of yuan-ti pureblood, killing all in Sseth's name... Ashra leads them, yesss.
The Coiled Cabal, mastersss of the arcane, they sharpen the minds and thoughts of our great race in preparation for the rise of the World Serpent.  At their head is Inhatri, powerful he is, yesss.

Sss... *become* one?  Of the Coiled Cabal...?  No, it isss forbidden to purebloods and warmbloods.  The Viper's Fangs... perhaps if Sseth favored you, then one of his fangs you might become.  Speak to Ashra if your will is sstrong, yesss.
Sss... warmbloods whose blood has run cold, yesss... Mezro warriorsss we have put to the blade... carved out their hearts, and they forever ssseek them, yesss.

Yesss... and difficult to control they are, for they seek out their hearts wherever they lie...  we had to place their heartsss within the idol in the ritual chamber with many doors between them, yesss, so that the heartless would remain within their pit... suffering in Sseth's name.

The Guardian is encircled by the stonesss, the stele by the temple's entrance... six in number, each marking the circle of the Guardian.  The Guardian was sealed there thousssands of years ago, and the stele hold him, yesss.

In his life lies the spirit of the great door to the cold realms from where Jeszrael has come... if the Guardian was slain, the door would be sealed, yesss... and so we have kept him safe within the altar atop the temple until the day we will need his power again.

The half-breed from the Eye of the Dragon... she has come a great distance, to ask us to join with her to drive the humans from her landssss... the attack will come soon, and all who oppose Sseth's will shall *die.*
The stones of the Guardian... six in number.  When the time comes, the stonesss shall be placed in their rightful place, and the Guardian will rise... a glorious day it will be, yesss.

That isssss the treasury; it holds the wealth of the temple inside and ssseems to draw all manner of eyes... we must drive the chef from there, frequently, and there has been talk that some of our assassins, the Viper's Fangs, wander too close there, yesss.

Yesss... we are often forced to reset the stones after their secret visssits.  It is a simple matter to press the eleventh stone and realign the stones, but it is... *irritating*... yesss.  It is *no* place for you... stay far from there, and keep ever mindful of Sseth...
Way to go, Avellone.
Way to go, Avellone.
We'll see, serpent.  Prepare to die!
I think you and Sseth will be meeting each other sooner than you think.
Forgive me, great one.  This temple is new to me, and I had many questions that only you could answer.
I'm unfamiliar with this place and had some questions.
I was looking for a way to close the crossroads to Kuldahar.
Your evil ends here, serpent.  Prepare to die!
It is of no matter.  Farewell.
We'll see, serpent.  Prepare to die!
I think you and Sseth will be meeting each other sooner than you think.
But... I wished to know more about Sseth and the World Serpent.
Forgive my ignorance, great one. This temple is new to me, and I would know where I may walk freely.
I'm unfamiliar with this place and am lost.
I was looking for a way to close the crossroads to Kuldahar.
Your evil ends here, serpent.  Prepare to die!
Farewell, then.
How should one best serve Sseth?
This temple is new to me, and I do not know where I may walk freely.
I'm unfamiliar with this place and am lost.
I was looking for a way to close the crossroads to Kuldahar.
Tell me about the Viper Fangs and the Coiled Cabal.
That ring of stones around the altar on the top of the temple... what purpose does it serve?
What are the Vault and the stones in the eastern chamber of the temple for?
Can you tell me about the Guardian?
What are the heartless dead?
Tell me about Jeszrael.
I doubt Sseth's influence will spread beyond these jungles... or your evil religion.
Your evil ends here, serpent.  Prepare to die!
Farewell, then.

I understand.  Farewell.
I shall endeavor to avoid these traps... where are they?

Tell me about Jeszrael.
That's all I needed to know.  Prepare to die.
Thank you.  I shall be more careful in the future.  Farewell.
Are there any other places should I avoid?  I would learn my place.

Who is Jeszrael?
Tell me about Jeszrael.
If you imprisoned the Guardian, how will you set him free?
So if this Guardian was slain, the crossroads would close, and Kuldahar would be saved?
Can you tell me about the Viper Fangs and the Coiled Cabal?
What are the heartless dead?
What are the Vault and the stones in the eastern chamber of the temple for?
Then it sounds like the Guardian needs to die...  right after you.
I see... farewell.

They keep going to the treasury?
